name: mfe-vite-demo
description: Micro-Frontend demonstration with Vite, React, TypeScript, Tailwind and Zustand

scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter remote-a build && pnpm --filter remote-b build && pnpm --filter host build && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r packages/host/dist/* dist/ && mkdir -p dist/remote-a && cp -r packages/remote-a/dist/* dist/remote-a/ && mkdir -p dist/remote-b && cp -r packages/remote-b/dist/* dist/remote-b/ && mkdir -p dist/shared && cp -r packages/shared/dist/* dist/shared/
scripts.build:remotes: pnpm --filter shared build && pnpm --filter remote-a build && pnpm --filter remote-b build

author: Luciano Monteiro
